sourcesContent:
{{ user.name }}
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; export type usertype = {id : number | null , name : string | null}; @Component({ selector: 'app-users', templateUrl: './users.component.html', styleUrls: ['./users.component.css'] }) export class UsersComponent { users : usertype[] = [ { id: 1, name: 'Max' }, { id: 2, name: 'Anna' }, { id: 3, name: 'Chris' } ]; }
